body: Hi everybody, I have another question for you!! Is there a way to plot the Zone Windows Total Transmitted Solar Radiation Rate in the model? (as you can do for the operative temperature through the Microclimate Map Analysis component). Because i have been using till now the 3D Chart (image attached) but through that component the result is not directly related to the model. Thanks a lot in advance Claudia
topic: How to plot the Transmitted Solar Radiation

replies.body: You can color each window based on transmitted radiation. Is this what you're looking for?

Hi Mostapha,

thanks for your reply. I know how to plot on the window the solar radiation, but actually i was looking for the transmitted solar radiation. Do you know if it is possible?

Thanks again

Claudia

Claudia,



Do you mean to plot it on the floor of the zone?

Hi Anton,

yes it is correct :)
